pkgmetadata.longdescription: Get and Modify 'oTree' Data // Manage data from 'oTree' experiments. Import 'oTree' data and clean them up by using functions to deal with messy data, dropouts, and other problematic cases. Create IDs, calculate the time, transfer variables between app data frames, and delete sensitive information. You can also check your experimental data before running the experiment. Information on 'oTree' is found in Chen, D. L., Schonger, M., Wickens, C. (2016) doi: 10.1016/j.jbef.2015.12.001.
